* Iron Raptor closed her eyes and shielded her face from the blast of dirt 
which showered all around her, gritting her teeth and wondering just how 
stupid she must be for letting her mind wander like that instead of staying 
on the battle. *
< You're gunna get yourself killed one of this days, you dumb bitch! > She 
thought to herself as the shower of dirt thinned out to leave a thin cloud 
of dust.
Blinking, Iron Raptor looked up to where Nemesis Enforcer's last position 
had been. Glaring through the cloud at him. *
< If only those wings worked! I�d go up there and wring his slaging neck!>
If there was one thing that pissed her off was enemies that ranted about how 
great they were or laughed like they were kings of the world!
But her eyes snapped towards the missile launcher in Nemesis�s hands, baring 
her teeth and clenching her fists. Watching him fire a rocket.
But while she kept her attention on Nemisis she managed to ignore 
Scattershot completely until pain brought her mind around.
Three of the ten armor-piercing missiles he had sent towards her left knee 
had managed to hit home. Digging in deeply and nearly destroying the joint 
completely, bringing a fair amount of mech-fluid to spatter out of the 
wounds and run down her leg.
Iron Raptor leaned her weight to her right side as pain shot through the 
left, leaving it basically limp and dead.
It was rather a good move, for an Alliance bot. Damaging a leg would leave 
her so that she couldn't run or walk. Making sure that she remained a still 
target!
Even though she hated to admit it.
Iron Raptors head snapped towards Scattershot as she brought down a hand 
over her knee, her eyes glaring at him.
But then her own pained smile crossed her lips as the battle program sunk in 
deeper.*

" Laugh while you can, pericite! You won't be laughing much longer!!"

* There was something that she knew that he didn't, and that was while she 
had been sitting back and letting Nemesis fire at her energy had been 
building up again.
Also, while she had thought of healing before her body had actually done it. 
Closing up the wound on her side by her thoughts.
Iron Raptor continued to glare towards Scattershot as her mind dwelled on 
her knee, feeling warm mech-fluid running between her fingers and running 
down her leg. In her mind she bonded the broken wires and cords, mending and 
piecing together the circuits, and molding the armor on the outside into the 
same solid mass it was before.
The ache was still there but the bleeding had stopped, and with a smart 
smile she whipped her hand across her knee so that Scattershot could see 
that she had taken care of his handy work.
Iron Raptor then straightened herself out and simply stepping aside as 
Nemisis' missile went by and exploded behind her. The fire from the 
explosion framing her figure as she squared her shoulders and the helm came 
over her head and her hair disappearing under it.
       Before she knew that Scattershot would have the chance to collect his 
wits, the shoulder cannons she had used before moved up and over her 
shoulders, her fingers taking hold of the joysticks as soon as the weapon 
was in place.
A white sighing laser pierced through the growing cloud of dust and aiming 
towards Scattershot�s chest-plate.
Iron Raptor smiled to herself, snickering before pressing the triggers on 
the sticks and sending 4 charges towards her enemy.
She would finish off Nemisis later!*
